title: Programming Assignment 1: Variables and Data Types
description: Write a Python program that demonstrates understanding of variables, data types, and basic operations.

title: Programming Assignment 2: Control Structures
description: Implement various control structures including loops and conditional statements.

title: Final Project Proposal
description: Submit a detailed proposal for your final project including objectives, methodology, and timeline.

title: Homework 3: Derivatives and Applications
description: Complete problems 1-25 from Chapter 3, focusing on derivative rules and applications.

title: Homework 4: Integration Techniques
description: Solve integration problems using various techniques including substitution and integration by parts.

title: Essay 1: Personal Narrative
description: Write a 750-1000 word personal narrative essay demonstrating clear thesis and organization.

title: Research Paper: Topic Selection
description: Choose and submit your research paper topic with preliminary bibliography.

title: Lab Report 2: Projectile Motion
description: Analyze experimental data and write a comprehensive lab report on projectile motion experiments.

title: Problem Set 3: Energy and Momentum
description: Solve problems related to conservation of energy and momentum in various physical systems.

title: Chapter 2 Quiz Preparation
description: Review material from Chapter 2: Biological Bases of Behavior for upcoming quiz.

title: Research Paper: Cognitive Development
description: Write a 6-8 page research paper on theories of cognitive development in children.

title: Midterm Exam Study Guide
description: Complete the comprehensive study guide covering all topics from weeks 1-7.

title: Quiz 4: Fundamental Theorem of Calculus
description: Prepare for quiz covering the Fundamental Theorem of Calculus and its applications.

title: Peer Review Workshop
description: Participate in peer review session for draft essays, providing constructive feedback.

title: Lab Report 1: Measurement and Error Analysis
description: Complete lab report analyzing measurement techniques and error propagation.
